channel.title: Pages on tTales
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on tTales

item.title: Now
item.description: Staying home and avoiding Covid-19. And trying to stay away from negative news channels, as much as possible. Everyone has some agenda. Which is just sickening! Hauptfokus I am working on a piece of software that will be able to make videos by itself(only a specific type of video). I’m also doing an online course by Jeremy Howard, Introduction to Machine Learning for Coders. Apart from all that, just trying to keep up with the quizzes and assignments.

item.title: About
item.description: Hey, I’m Hans Ollivander (Han5 011ivand3r). I am a student and creator. As a student, I like diving deep into my topics of interest. And by creator, I don’t mean making magic wands. I mean creating doodles, writing and making silly softwares. I am passionate about human space exploration, machine learning and visual design. I spend a lot of my time thinking, what makes humans the way they are. I read books and articles on them.
